#summary Tasks in ConEmu

The ‘Task’ is one or more predefined commands (shells) which you may start anytime by name or hotkey.

<img src="http://conemu-maximus5.googlecode.com/svn/files/ConEmuStartTask.png" title="Start task dropdown menu" alt="ConEmu's tasks dropdown">

Tasks may be configured in the [SettingsTasks ‘Settings’ dialog].
